description.value:
You’ve studied—or survived—your share of hazards and learned a thing or two about sniffing out secrets. When you select this talent, you gain the following benefits:

  • You have advantage on ability checks made to actively search for secret doors or traps.

  • Traveling at a fast pace doesn’t impose the standard −5 penalty to your passive Perception score.

  • You have advantage on saves made to avoid or resist traps and hazards.
